summary.research_focus: Artificial Intelligence, Software Engineering, Edge Computing, Cybersecurity
responsibilities: Undertaking research to support the planning and delivery of the research activity, which will include investigating, characterising, and developing ontologies of software vulnerabilities in the edge computing environment.
Monitoring and/or analysing source code (and data), software behaviours, and software environment to identify potential vulnerabilities and assess their impacts.
Predicting or identifying vulnerabilities early, to fix them quickly and effectively, preventing potential exploitation.
Improving organisations' overall security posture by identifying and mitigating potential weaknesses.
Investigating the software quality certification/robustness to cyber disturbances and cyber-attacks on federated/distributed EC environment.
Identifying quality issues with AI model implementation on edge and offering mitigation strategies.

employment_terms.contract_duration: 2 years, with potential for renewal or permanence based on funding.
